Articles.Content:
Hello everybody,

I am quite new on KSP but I believe I am doing pretty good already, still I have a very frustrating problem: Every time I hit the spacebar to stage with a maneuver planned, the maneuver is cancelled. If anyone has a solution to offer, please let me know, it is so embarassing to deal with that when struggling to get on a transfer orbit!

Thank you in advance

That's odd, I don't recall that happening last time I staged during a maneuver. It tends to only lose them when you switch ships, or return to space centre.

Perhaps you could plot the maneuver after staging somehow?

This was staged in the middle of a burn. (And yep, those aren't parts from the base game.)

Welcome to the forums!

Welcome to the forums!

I don't know if this is a bug or something(probally not because of your dV in stages), but yeah. :/

Well thank you guys! At least it may be an efficient way to learn how to optimize my ships, and if iit gets too embarassing, i'll just re-download the game

If anyone has a solution, please post it below
What I do normally if I'm having a really bad unsolvable bug problem is just delete all the game files and download it again form Steam, which is really sad because I lose all of my ships .
Maybe you could just copy your world saves and then paste it back after re-downloading

What I do normally if I'm having a really bad unsolvable bug problem is just delete all the game files and download it again form Steam, which is really sad because I lose all of my ships .

Just copy all of your Craft files to a different location and copy them back after reinstalling the game. You can even do this with good flying spacecraft between the games that you start in KSP

BTY, Space bar staging does not work while in map mode, you have to switch back to camera mode.
